column1: touch fuller and angled across, Gayle plays inside the line as this whizzes through to the keeper
once again probing around that off stump at length, defended towards point
swings back in, pitches and nips away to take the leading edge past point. Gayle looked to turn this into the legside. He's very slow and so they won't take the second.
right behind the line of this length ball as he defends with soft hands
goes back into the crease and punches this length ball to cover, an overthrow at the striker's end means they steal a single that should've been.
shows the full face of the bat as he defends this short of length ball back down the pitch
solidly defended from the crease
slides this down leg, he shapes to sweep but misses.

spins back in but the length is too short, Lewis makes room and cuts into the gap between cover and point. There's an appeal for a run-out at the bowler's end as Chris Gayle is very lazy and plonks his bat in. May have just gotten away despite a direct hit at the bowler's end.
fuller on the stumps, he lunges forward and blocks
bunts this down to the leg side for a single
drifts into middle and leg, defended with the angle

edged past the slip fielder. The second slip was taken out halfway through the previous Zadran over. This time the ball flies off a thick edge as Lewis pokes at this length ball. The bounce and carry would've meant a wicket early had the catch been taken. Instead, it flies to the third man fence
right into the blockhole on off stump, squeezed to the off side
turns this length ball on middle and leg to fine leg
looks to back away and muscle this pull over midwicket but is beaten as he swung through early
plays inside the line as this whizzes past the outside edge. Lovely angle from Zadran
shapes back in to beat Gayle's swing and hit the pad as he looks to whip over midwicket
tossed up outside off, driven hard to sweeper cover

Mujeeb's bag of tricks has bamboozled Gayle. This is a googly that pitches on middle and off, spins just a wee bit to beat the outside edge, clip the top of the back pad and hit off stump. Gayle and Mujeeb could well be training together a lot from April at the IPL, for now, he'll have to simply walk back.
gets to the pitch of the ball and eases this to long-off
fired full on off, he's half forward in defense
beaten by one that turns late to square him up. Superb

off balance as he looks to sweep from way outside off, slips inside the crease. They go upstairs to check for a stumping anyway, but he's in. Shahzad misses the bails first time, but manages to whip the bails off on the second attempt. He's in though.
slants one across the left-hander, left alone
width and he's punched this into the gap between cover and point. The outfield is slow, they'll come back for the third though
nearly chopped on as he shaped to punch. Thick inside edge past leg stump as they jog a single
solidly defends this length ball on middle to the leg side
gets some shape back in. This starts outside off, so he gets forward and defends gently back down the pitch
length ball angled across, left alone
drifts in a length ball from around the stumps, defended
rocks back to pull, beaten by a skidder outside off.
touch fuller and drifting in from wide of the crease, he lunges forward and blocks
goes back and across as he defends into the off side
slider that he makes room and punches to cover
angles back in to thud into the pad as he looks to whip this square
touch fuller and just outside off, Hetmyer defends towards cover
bends back in to hit the pad but the impact would've been outside leg. They take a legbye off the deflection
slash and a miss. Looked to thump this between cover and point
pacy delivery angling away, there's a temptation to hit through the line but Lewis leaves

beauty of a delivery. Has it taken the edge? The umpire says no. This is short of length and angling away, Lewis hops across to defend but is beaten as he's late on the stroke. Sound may have been that of bat flicking the bat
another beauty. This leaves him late to beat Lewis as he hops across to defend. Missed that by some distance
pushes this to cover, there's a slight misfield but they don't take the single.
lunges forward to defend, but plays down the wrong line of this googly. Beaten
steps out, gets very close to the ball and works this into the gap at midwicket
goes right back into the crease and defends
squeezes a thick inside edge to square leg. Played outside the line as this drifted in a long way.
slides back in a long way, but this one is way own leg, good take
swept hard to beat short fine, into the gap between him and square leg. Welcome boundary
pulled but in no control. On the bounce to square leg
slashes to get a thick outside edge down to square third man. The length not there for the big booming drive
stunning drive but an excellent stop at extra cover by Shinwari. Anticipated it, took a couple of steps to his right and put his right hand out.
too full and on the pads, picked away effortlessly. Lovely flick of the wrists, kept it down too, raced between midwicket and mid-on.
beaten by one that keeps low. Looked to punch but played down the wrong line too
rocks back and cuts to cover
very nicely done. Touch short and angling in, he made room and then caressed it wide of short third man. Smart stuff
lunges forward and eases this down to long-off
drifting into middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
turns this from outside off towards square leg
too short and punished. Makes room and punches this into the gap at point, but the outfield's slow.
this short of length delivery stopped on him as he looked to punch, on the bounce to cover as he went through with the stroke
picked away towards deep square again. Too short from Naib, will have to adjust his lengths here
right behind the line as he turns this into the leg side
squirts this gently behind point as they jog a single
too far down leg, angled in from wide of the crease. Looks to tickle it fine but misses.
right behind the line of this short of length delivery as he defends with soft hands

big wicket for Nabi first up. The drift and angle has done the trick. Nice flight but this lands on off stump and goes straight on, Hetmyer gets a thin inside edge as he prods forward. No DRS, so he'll have to walk back. 100 ODI wickets for Nabi
fired full on off stump, defended.
slashes and misses. This was a little too close for him to play the stroke
gets a thick edge that flies past the slip fielder. Nabi isn't pleased with the effort. Had the batsman pushing at it with an angled bat
just short of cover. Went for a big drive over the infield but got nowhere near the pitch. Had to lunge forward a long way though. Superb bowling from Nabi
hops back and across as he whips this to deep square leg
gets a thick bottom edge on an attempted cut shot, rolls to the keeper.
gets this to jag away off the seam from length outside off, left alone
slashed into the gap at deep extra cover, good work from the man running across from deep point.

steers this to point as they take off for a suicidal single. This is superb from Najibullah Zadran, who runs quickly to his left, picks up the ball and fires a direct hit to leave Lewis high and dry. He wasn't even in the frame, wasn't running too fast either, especially with the left glove in his hands. This is very poor from West Indies, but outstanding athleticism from Zadran.
back of length outside off, left alone. Wide called, may have been a harsh call.
touch fuller and just outside off, left alone
turns gently from off stump, plays outside the line and gets a thick inside edge into the leg side
goes back into the crease and dabs this into the off side
lands this at length on off, this skids on, defended from the crease by Samuels
fired full on off stump, he's half forward as he plays it with soft hands to the off side
on the pads, worked with the angle to midwicket
well forward as he dabs this with one hand behind the keeper. Maiden over
touch short, he cuts this straight to point. There's a direct hit at the bowler's end but they werent' taking a single this time.
mistimes a drive to sweeper cover as they jog the single
slower ball gone wrong, turns out to be a low full toss that has been hit hard to sweeper cover
beaten by a beauty! This keeps low as he plays inside the line to defend.
touch full and outside off, nips away of the seam, left alon
slower length ball on off stump, steered to third man.
tossed up on middle and off, driven to long-off
good length, spinning outside off, gets forward and blocks
slider on middle, pushed off the inside of the bat back to the bowler
full around off, driven to point
sliding fuller one one leg, drilled to midwicket off the inside of the bat, throw misses the stumps as he completes a tight single
flighted on the stumps and blocked
back of a length, stands tall and punches wide of long-off
fired through quicker on middle, blocked
full outside off, pats it down to long-on
short of a length, straightening around off, backs away and cuts through cover
shuffles across and blocks down the pitch
pitched up on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
tossed up and slid in around off, pushed into the off side
sliding length ball, defended
flighted outside off, driven to sweeper cover
pitched up and looped in around off, hammers to cover

is that a stumping? Afghanistan seem excited. Sharifuddin draws him out of the crease with flight and then gets it to dip and spin away to beat the flashing blade. The backfoot did slide out but he's planted it back in time
mistimes a drill into the covers
spinning in from a length, punched to mid-on for a very quick single
fuller, pushes it out off the edge through cover. The bat turned in his hands as he did so
stands on the backfoot and punches to mid-on who runs across and dives to his left to stop it
spinning in from a length, tucked to backward square leg
full on the stumps, blocked
closes the face for a clip through leg side and gets an inside edge to the pad
gets the front foot out early and then waits for it to spin away outside off and defend
slides it into off, drilled to cover
comes on towards middle with the arm, finds the inside of the bat as he defends
full on middle and leg, blocked. Another inside edge to the pad
full on middle and leg, worked to midwicket off the inside part of the bat
length on off, blocked off the backfoot
shuffles across and drops this to point
sliding into leg and pinning the pad as he fails to pat it away
short, spinning in, pulled to deep square leg
not as much turn on this back of a length delivery and he punches it to long-off
fuller, eased down to long-on
back of a length, defended from the crease
looped up around off, defended
tries to force a cut without room and a misfield at point gives them a single
pitched up on middle and off, driven out
comes down the track and meets the pitch before shoveling this straight down the ground
defended tightly off the front foot into the off side
pushed past cover and point
fullish, slight turn outside off, pushed off the front foot
full, driven to long-off
full and accurate on middle, blocked down the pitch
comes down the track and defends this length ball into the off side
advances and heaves this over midwicket. Long-on sprints to his right and stops it in front of the boundary
full on middle, defended
comes down the track to smother the turn of this length ball
advances to the length ball and defends
short of a length, turned away to midwicket
driven with the spin to long-off
shapes to cut but is deceived by the googly, gets a thick inside edge past short fine leg
eased with the spin to point
drills this straight down the ground, Rashid puts his right boot out to stop this
slow turn from middle, punched to cover point
pushed through quicker on off stump, Samuels opens the bat face and defends towards point
back of a length on off, shuffles across and blocks
short and wide, cut to deep point
sliding length ball, gets forward and defends and the ball finds the inside of the bat
comes down the track and tries to heave it over the off side but the spin is too sharp and the ball skews off the outside part of the bat to third man
full and wide, crunched to sweeper cover
length ball on middle and off, defended
full, presses forward and reaches out to get a mild outside edge to gully
full and flat on the stumps, clipped to midwicket
full, drilled to long-off
short, tries to shift back and pull and gets a bit of a bottom edge towards midwicket
eased to cover

huge shout for lbw, umpire Michael Gough has no reaction. Oh, dear! That seemed plumb. Probably he thought it was outside off because Hope had shuffled across. The pads cover all of the stumps, so you can't really make out. Hope was looking to flick off the backfoot but the lack of turn meant he is hit on the pad
hammered down to long-on
length, spins away outside off, shuffles across and steers to the off side
presses forward and eases into point
opens the face and eases to point
pushes to cover
dabs to square leg off the pads
short of a length, spinning in, flicked to square leg
slugs a length ball from outside off to the right of long-on who manages to get to it
flat, on a length, spinning in, punched to long-on
short again, this time he muscles a pull through deep midwicket
good length outside off, defends off the outside of the bat
short, wide, cut to sweeper cover
pitched up on leg, flayed to long-off
low full toss, pushed back
back of a length, slides on, tucked to deep square leg
full on leg, drilled back and Rashid half-stops with his left foot
ah, nicely bowled. Went through his defences but missing off-stump as narrowly as it snuck past the outside edge
hammered to long-on after deflecting off the non-striker
flat, back of a length on middle, kept out
short outside off, drags a pull to long-on
non-turning length ball outside off, blocked
flighted outside off, drilled to long-on

caught at deep midwicket. Backs himself to clear the big boundary and picks out the fielder. Tries to heave a length ball over but doesn't quite middle it and two fielders running from opposite ends converge. One of them snaffles it
full, driven to long-off
length, outside off, shuffles across and blocks
flat, short of a length, defended back
too full, can't get underneath it as the ball sneaks away to the keeper
floated up outside off, pushed to the left of sweeper cover
full, eased down to long-on
stays back and flicks this back of a length delivery away to square leg
length outside off, flicked to midwicket
stops on him a little and Holder closes the face early to chip this in the air. Lands safely
length outside off, blocked
length, keeps low outside off, blocked
length, spins in from outside off, kept out
short of a length, flicked past the diving midwicket fielder
full toss, driven to long-on
flat, short of a length, blocked
short of a length, spinning away, defended
googly, spinning in from a back of a length, manages to defend despite shuffling across
full, wide, flashes the bat away from the body and gets an outside part of the bat through the backward point region
too much flight outside off, a full toss this time, and Holder drives it with good timing to beat cover diving to his left
short of a length, flicked to midwicket
length, minimal turn, shifts back and flicks to midwicket
full and flat, flicked to midwicket
full, sprayed on leg stump, pats it away to square leg
length, spinning in, flicked to midwicket
short of a length, waits and opens the face to point
length on middle and leg, tucked to deep midwicket
squirts this down to third man. Opened the bat face to steer this away. Was hurried for pace by Dawlat
has he gloved this to the keeper? Wasn't far from him. Shaped to help this pull down to fine leg.
length on off stump, dabs this gently behind point for an easy single
floats this full on off, there's a hint of reverse in. Defended from the crease to the covers
squirts this drive to deep cover for an easy single
hurried for pace with this full toss way above his waist, tucked into the leg side. This is a no-ball for height. Freehit called
right into the blockhole, a yorker at the base of legstump, squeezed to deep midwicket
fired full on the pads, squeezed to short fine leg
drifting into middle and leg, worked with the angle towards deep midwicket
touch short but drifting in, turned with the spin to short midwicket
stumping missed by Shahzad! Saw Holder charging down and fired this down, Holder missed and was off balance. Tough chanace down leg but you have to take those at this level
rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover
down on one knee as he sweeps this with the spin to clear deep midwicket. Excellent use of the bottomhand. Superb.
floats it full on middle and leg from wide of the crease, squeezed back to the bowler
flat-bats this pull down to long-on for an easy single
uses the pace to steer this back of length delivery to point
helps this short ball on the pull to deep square leg
full and straight on the stumps, eased towards long-on for an easy single
fired full on the stumps, eased to long-on
did that carry? This just fell short of midwicket as he looked to punch over the infield
right behind the line in defence
right to the pitch of the ball as he eases this full delivery to deep extra cover
bunts this length ball outside off to extra cover
turns this full ball with the spin to mid-on
swing and a miss. Sharp turn and bounce from length outside off, Holder looked to mow across the line
driven hard to long-off
squared up by the length. Spun sharply to whizz past the outside edge. Stunning delivery, deflected of Shahzad's glove
gets a good stride forward and smothers the spin
full on off, blocked
swipes this length ball outside off to wide long-off
swept from way outside off to deep midwicket

he's hit this well but picks out long-on. This was too full outside off, he looked to belt this over long-on but couldn't get the elevation he would've liked. Make no mistake, this is an excellent catch Najibullah Zadran, absorbed the momentum on that hit superbly.
huge appeal for lbw but there was a thin inside edge as he pushed t this delivery from the crease
fired full outside off, defended
super delivery. Drifts into middle and turns sharply to square him up and beat him. The carrom ball
sharp turn from outside off, looked to ease this behind point but withdrew at the last moment
full on the stumps, defended
beaten on the sweep that he tried to fetch from way outside off
shapes to drive, but misses. The bat hit the ground as the keeper collected that and went up for a catch
lunges forward and smothers this tossed up delivery on off stump
right to the pitch of the ball as he eases this down to long-off
flatter one on middle and leg, worked to deep square leg
goes back and across to punch this down to long-on
superb from Zadran at long-on. Shai Hope slog this from across the line when he may have been better off looking to hit through the off side. Zadran had to run a long way to his left.
walks across and whips this quicker delivery to midwicket
no clue, plays down the wrong line in trying to work this to the leg side, the ball rolls back down the pitch
lunges forward and defends with his bat well in front of the pad
drifts into middle and leg, worked towards long-on
gets outside the line of the stumps and sweeps this from middle to the deep square leg boundary. Lovely timing

top-edges this sweep from way outside off to deep square leg. He was looking to hit out, not such a good shot to play under the circumstances because he had to fetch this against the turn. Didn't get underneath the flight either.
gets half a stride in as he defends
turns this against the line to long-on
clean strike over extra cover, big outfield, huge open space. Back for the second
drifts in and skids on to beat the bat. Big appeal but the impact was outside off
leading edge that rolls to short third man. Played down the wrong line too
delicate little dab to short third man, looks for a single but can't get it
gets across the line of the stumps to sweep, played too early. Beaten by the drift down leg

swept straight to deep square leg. Not for the first time today have we seen a batsman looking to do that. This is very poor application. West Indies in danger of being bowled out well inside their quota of overs. Rashid's first wicket of the day.
lunges forward and squeezes the drive to point
uppish but can't hold on at point. He made room to cut, but this was hit off the top part of the bat.
lunges forward to defend, gets a thick inside edge to square leg
has he got him? Drifts in full from around the stumps, looks to work across the line but is hit on off stump. Not out says the umpire.
flatter one that drifts in and skids on, he's hit on the pad in trying to work down leg. Straightened enough, very very close. Not given
dabs this full delivery towards short cover for a quick single, off the mark in international cricket
rocks back and cuts to short third man
turns this gently towards short fine leg
flatter one on middle and leg, tucked towards deep square
fired full on leg stump from around the stumps, tucked gently into the leg side for a quick single
quicker delivery drifting away from around the stumps, turned to square leg for a quick single
once again clever stuff, gentle dab to the leg side as they scamper a run
punches this from outside off towards the man coming in from deep midwicket
wrong'un but too full, gets a thick inside edge to long-on. Was looking to hit that a lot straighter
works this off his hip to deep square leg
sharp turn from off stump, beaten as he tries to work this against the turn
both feet rooted to the crease as he defends back this quicker delivery
sharp turn, fastish delivery again. Beaten as he prods forward.
plays outside the line, gets an inside edge that rolls to the leg side.
fired outside off at 107kph from around the stumps, beaten as he tries to ease this past short third man
gentle little tuck towards short fine for a quick single
turn from leg stump, deflects off the pad towards square leg, they scamper a run
looks to drill this over the bowler's head, toe-ends back to the bowler.
sweep and a miss. The ball was drifting away from around the stumps.
squeezed back past the bowler
full toss, but a no-ball for height. Swatted down to long-on. Freehit coming up
backs away and carves this full delivery straight to deep extra cover
he's swung this cleanly into the grass banks at deep midwicket. Back-of-the-hand slower delivery which he picked up superbly
swing and a miss. Went through with the pull even before the ball arrive,d the keeper missed the underarm flick as well
slips in a yorker, he looks to clear the front leg and swing but the bowler followed him, squeezed to short third man
pulled but not entirely in control, down to deep square for a single
sees the batsman trying to scoop and bangs in a short ball. Batsman misses and is hit on the right shoulder. They get across for a leg-bye.
gets this to leave him from length outside off, left alone
hurried for pace, off balance as he tucks this short of length delivery down to fine leg
thick outside edge to third man. Was drawn forward by the length. Genuine edge
length outside off, Shahzad heaves this over the bowler's head. Not enough power but this trickles through
angles a short of length delivery down leg, can't afford to give away extra runs like those
another ill-directed delivery down leg, excellent work by Hope in diving to his left to pull out a one-handed stop
squared up by the length, this is a touch fuller on off. Defended
hops back into the crease and defends this short of length delivery on the stumps.
full but this is way outside off. Perhaps slipped? Wide called. Nervous first ball.

he's struck with his first legal delivery. What a strike this. Nothing nervous about this. Angles in a length ball on middle and off, it pitches and straightens as Ahmadi is struck on the pad playing all around it. As plumb as decisions come.
skiddy length ball that moves away from outside off, left alone
length ball on off stump, he stands tall and defends
pacy but down leg. Another wide
beaten by a feeble forward push. Late movement away.
goes back into the crease and bunts this length ball back to the bowler
lunges forward and steers this length ball down to third man.
pushes him back with the length, defended into the off side
full but angling down leg, looks to flick but misses.
goes back into the crease and shows the full face of the bat in defence
drawn forward by this full length delivery, squirted to point
gets a good forward stride in as he defends this full delivery back
shortens his length, angles one on middle, defended
races between second slip and gully. Lucky break. If only there was third slip. Oh, dear. Genuine edge as he shapes to drive. Raced away towards third man, good work there.
gets half forward and defends this short of length delivery back to the bowler
floats this much fuller around off stump, defended from the crease to mid-on
beaten for pace as he looks to pull. The bowler went up in an appeal. There was some noise, but the deflection was off the back of the helmet
up and over the infield but there's no control over this lofted hit. Plonks near the boundaryl
hops back and bunts this back. Another pacy delivery

what kind of shot selection is that? He backs away to go over cover but the length is on the shorter side so he ends up reaching out to it as he backs away, because this is floated wide, and goes after it to mistime the skier to cover. Wicket number 99 for Jason Holder.
short of length outside off, he drops his wrists and watches this zip through to the keeper.
beauty! Zips from length outside off, play and a miss.
stands tall and punches this towards point where Hetmyer dives to his right to take some pace off. They'll come back for the third
back of length delivery outside off, left alone.
superb delivery. Drew him forward by pitching this up outside off, he had a poke but missed.
beauty. Has he got him? Squared up completely. Bowler and keeper thought there was a thin edge, but umpire Michael Gough not convinced. Good decision too.
right back into the cease as he defends.
floats this full on the stumps, defended back
floats this full on the stumps from wide of the crease, defended back
squirts this forward push to cover
stands tall and tucks this to short midwicket for a quick single
scorching drive, good work at cover by Samuels, who got some hand on it.
back and across as he defends this length ball to point
has a big slash at that but can't get any bat on it. Beaten
this is a beautiful square drive. Touch too full from Holder, he leant into the drive, sweet timing. Played it late, played it under his eyes
drifting into the pads, tickles to fine leg
slips in a full ball outside off, left alone
gets a thick inside edge on the drive to square leg
skiddy length ball, hurried for pace as he gloves this pull to fine leg
nice balance and timing as he picks this into the gap at midwicket
right behind the line of this length ball as he defends.
back of length outside off, left alone.
shows the full face of the bat in defence.
hops back to defend but this gets big on him and hits him on the stomach as he tries to work this towards square leg
much fuller and straighter on middle stump, defended back
another pull, not entirely in control but hit into the gap at square leg
looks to sway out of the way of this short ball but this angles in to deflect off the glove to slip. Cramped for room
width on offer, there for the cut but he lets it go
nice stride forward as he defends
swivels back and helps this short ball down to deep square leg
straightens this length ball from off stump, defended back
laces this drive past extra cover, back for the couple comfortably. Nicely done
gets a long way forward as he defends this length delivery to cover.
solid forward push, gets this into the gap at cover.
back of a length, sliding, tucked away to square leg
loops it and slides it on middle and leg, advances and drills it down to long-off
comes on with the arm and finds the inside of the bat as he defends off the front foot
turned away to the on side
short of a length outside off, makes room and punches to sweeper cover
good length, punched to long-off
fullish length, clipped off the pads to midwicket
good length outside off, gets forward and blocks
short of a length, shuffles across and defends in front of off
short, waits for it to get up outside off before getting on top and slapping it through backward point
short, width on offer, gets on top and keeps it down on the off side
good length on middle, defended down the pitch
slides a fuller one on middle, defended
advances down the ground and drives back
stands tall and punches to long-on
shuffles across within the crease and blocks
slider, trickles off the inside edge to backward square leg as he comes forward to defend
comes down the track and drills it to wide long-off
shot! Good stride forward to this length ball and punches down the ground
good length, jags away ever-so-slightly outside off and beats the outside edge
presses forward to a length ball and blocks into the off side
shot! Picks the gap well. Fuller outside off, just leans forward and eases into a drive between cover and extra cover
short of a length, jumps back and blocks

in the air, and into the boundary. Expensive over for West Indies. Twelve off it. This one's short and banged in halfway. Rahmat swivels and pulls off the top portion of the bat, beats deep backward square leg running to his right, as it goes one-bounce into the boundary
good shot. Gets down for a sweep and fetches it from outside off. Loopy and drifting in towards off and he uses that angle to crunch it through backward square leg
length, defended off the front foot
dropped. Gayle at first slip. Shenwari tries to force a cut without much room and the resultant edge crushes the glove of the keeper and that must have made it hard for Gayle to time his movements
worked away through the cover
punched off the backfoot to long-off
blocked off the backfoot
short of a length, shifts back and defends with an open face to point
good length, drilled with a slightly closed face of the bat towards mid-on
full, drilled back dead straight and the bowler gets a hand to it
short, comes into him, controls a pull to deep square leg
good length outside off, leans forward and opens the face to backward point
back of a length, stays back and punches to long-on
punched off the backfoot
full, clipped away to square leg
full and accurate on middle, defended
slider, driven back off the inside of the bat
length ball, drilled off the inside of the bat to mid-on
short, swivels and pulls to deep backward square leg. Fifty of the partnership
short of a length, jumps and defends
length, coming into him, turned away to deep square leg
length, angling in, presents the full face and defends to mid-on
short of a length, drifting down the leg side
pitched up outside off, driven back to the bowler
short of a length, beats point to his right with a backfoot punch
pitched right up, driven to long-off
length ball on off, defended to cover
fullish outside off, worked through the gap between cover and point
sees this one drifting down and gets down and across for a neat paddle to fine leg
good length around off, blocked
length outside off, blocked to cover
short, drifting down the leg side and goes just over the back of the batsman as he bends. Gets past the keeper diving to his left
fuller, eases forward and plays to cover where Gayle misfields. Through the legs. That's sloppy
slower ball, not picked, defends awkwardly from the crease
short of a length, cuts in, defended back
sliding on leg, clipped into the leg side
full, angled towards leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket

almost dropped. Gayle takes it on the third attempt. It was a simple take but he made it seem a lot harder by grabbing at it with his right hand. That was because he was late to react and move his hands but no damage in the end. Poor stroke from Shenwari who pushes way away from the body
plants the foot forward and Miller gets some turn to find the outside edge to third man
stays back to a short of a length delivery and punches to mid-off
flighted and curving in towards off, drilled down to long-off
length ball outside off, stabbed to point
short of a length outside off, opens the face and works to backward point

edged and short of first slip. Again pushing away without making an effort to get behind the line. This one holds its line but the lack of feet results in an outside edge. Played gently so doesn't carry
short, fails to get on top of the bounce as he pulls off the top part just over a leaping square leg
good length, angling in towards off, blocked
short of a length, stands tall and punches to point
flighted and curving in towards leg, inside-edged to the pad as he tries to clip it away
advances down the ground and pushes towards mid-off
good length on middle, blocked
flighted on leg, pushed to long-on
good length on middle, defended
full, clipped off the pads to midwicket
full on middle and leg, clipped to mid-on
short, gets on top and punches to point
short, gets on top and keeps it out on the leg side
short of a length, flicked to deep fine leg
short of a length, flicked to backward square leg and they attempt a risky single. Direct throw could have had him in trouble there. Oh, yeah, would have been out by a long way
full, defends and the ball goes to the on side off the inside of the bat
driven back
short of a length, punched through cover
advances and meets the pitch before punching this length ball to long-off
comes down the track and flicks to square leg

run out chance, direct hit would have had him back probably. Nabi gets on top and drops this short one into square leg and Rahmat sets off three-quarters of the distance even as Nabi yells no and stays put
short, jumps and keeps it out
short, gets well over the batsman
full, outside off, in the slot and Nabi responds with a booming drive through the covers
drifting down the leg side
short of a length, flicked to deep backward square leg
length, defended into cover
non-turning length ball outside off, blocked
full, flicked to on side
pitched up outside off, driven to long-on
worked back to the bowler
full outside off, punched to long-on
turned away to midwicket
full on middle and off, defended back
swivels back and helps this short ball to fine leg
sways out of this short ball outside off, through to the keeper
skiddy length ball on the stumps, he hops back and defends
excellent short ball that ties Nabi into knots as he hops back and defends. Somehow manages to fend this down
once again beats him for pace by angling in a short of length ball on middle and leg, hit on the thigh pad as he shapes to defend.
tossed up on off stump, defended back

he's miscued this slog sweep, but the man running back from mid-on can't get to the ball. It's the captain, who tried his best but this just kept going away. Top-edged this slog sweep. He would've been very nervous for a while there
flatter on middle, defended
accurate. Full on the stumps, defended.
makes room and punches this short ball down to long-off
works this with the spin to midwicket
thick outside edge past the keeper for a boundary. Don't think it was deliberate. If only there was a slip in place. Oh, dear.
floats one in full from wide of the crease, defended back
angles a length ball on off, eased to point
pulled away towards deep square leg
right behind the line of this length ball as he defends to the leg side
yorker-length on middle, squeezed back to the bowler.
steps out to go over the top but the bowler fires this in, defended back
tucks this flatter one on middle to midwicket
on middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
punches this past the diving short mid-on fielder
lunges forward and drives to cover. Some drift here for Nurse
steps out to work towards the leg side, gets a leading edge that rolls back to the bowler
angles a length ball on middle, defended
touch fuller outside off, turns this down to long-on
gets outside the line of the stumps and defends this length ball
looks to force this on the up but is cramped for room, rolls back to the bowler off the inside edge
punches this length ball on middle to mid-on
hit back hard, the bowler got his hands on his followthrough. Would've been a superb reflex action catch had he taken it. Really, really hard.
drifts away a short ball on off stump, cuts to point
eased with the spin to long-on
defended back to the bowler
flatter on middle, goes back and across as he defends
steps out and chips this over the infield, down into the gap. Man from deep square comes around to cut that off
right to the pitch of the ball as he drives this full delivery to sweeper cover
defended from the crease
stands tall and punches this to deep point for an easy single
angles a length ball on off from wide of the crease, punched to long-on
on middle and leg, he hops across and wrists this down to deep square leg
too easy. Sitting up nicely as he punches this down to long-on
steers this short delivery outside off to deep cover. Rahmat's second half-century in this tournament. Can he see them through?
short on middle and leg, turned to shrot fine leg
goes back and defends a delivery he shoulwd've been forward. Nurse got this to dip on him
nicely forward as he drives to wide long-off
swept to short fine, where Gayle manages to get some hand on the ball to half-stop it. Saved two runs for the side Haven't seen him dive in a long, long time.
lunges forward and blocks
right to the pitch of the ball as he drives to long-off
turns this length ball on middle and leg to square leg
gets onto his toes and helps this short delivery down to deep fine leg
pushes outside the line, gets a thick inside edge to short fine
rolls his wrists and keeps this flick down, superb work by Nurse at square leg. Stops the ball, recovers to fire a throw at the striker's end
right behind the line of this full delivery in defense.

this is an outstanding catch at deep square leg. Does that crack the game open again? Hetmyer deserves accolades for running in as soon as the ball was it. He may have had doubts whether to go forward or try and save the boundary. He took the aggressive route by diving forward to complete the catch. Nabi absolutely nailed the pull and he now walks off in disbelief.
flatter and fuller on middle and leg, turned to deep square
drifting in full on middle, defended back with soft hands
fired full on the stumps, defended back
rocks back and steers this short ball to points
drifting into middle and leg, looks to defend but the ball skids back in to hit the pad
rolls off a thick inside edge to square leg as he prods forward to defend
slashes and misses. This was there for the cut
right on top of the bounce as he defends back down the pitch
tucked wide of midwicket off the hip
floats this full on middle and off, defended from the crease.
gets on top of the bounce and steers this down to third man
slower and fuller on off stump, defended from the crease
top shot. Gets outside the line of the stumps and sweeps this powerfully with the spin to the backward square leg boundary
steps out to go over the top but the bowler fires this full and flat, defended
turns this gently to short fine leg
goes for a big hit, but ends up mistiming it back to the bowler. Lured by the flight, wanted to go over cover
turns this to fine leg
cuts but straight to point
eased with the spin to long-off
steps out and drags this slog from outside off to deep midwicket
good, clean strike. Wow. Stepped out, got underneath the flight and lofted that cleanly over long-off. All timing and class. Didn't try to overhit this, that was the trick. So good to watch
hint of turn from middle, defended back
steps out and works this down to long-on
steps out and tucks this short delivery to midwicket
worked with the spin to long-on
forces this into the off side to deep cover

there's the big wicket, one that will send shivers down the spines of many in Afghanistan. This was short, he tried to rock back and cut but ended up hitting it straight to Paul at backward point. He can't believe what he's just done. Is there hope yet for West Indies?
fired full on off, driven to deep cover
defended back with the spin to Nurse, who dives to his right to stop that
driven through the line to long-off
hops back and defends this length ball to the off side
drifting into the leg side, tucked to fine leg
gets on top of the bounce and turns this gently into the leg side
defended off the backfoot to short cover
squeezes this flick to midwicket, super work inside the ring.
toe-ends a pull from outside off to Nurse at midwicket
swept fine but straight to short fine leg
steps out and bangs this down the ground, crashes into the sightscreen. Top hit under pressure. Made a bit of room so he had the full swinging arc at his disposal. Picked the bones out of this.
brings out the reverse sweep, and he's hit this superbly. Beats the diving deep point fielder. That should ease plenty of pressure
flatter on middle and leg, worked towards the man coming in from deep square. Aggressive running. Lazy effort on the field
down to long-on for an easy single
flatter and fuller on middle, defended from the crease.
yorker-length outside off, squeezed to point

he's hit this straight down the throat of third man. This was short outside off, Najibullah jumped back and looked to help this over the ropes, but may have been cramped for room so couldn't hit it square. This game continues to swing from one side to another.
squeezes this drive to sweeper cover to get off the mark
gets on top of the bounce and dabs this wide of point
slashes and misses. Ooooh, too close to the edge. Looked to help this over point but was cramped for room
punches this slower length ball to cover
punched to cover where Bishoo misfields to concede two extra runs
short on middle, he ducks under it
squirts this with an angled bat to third man
right behind the line of this length ball as he defends
too short, he swivels back and powerfully pulls this to the deep backward square leg boundary. Struck this off the middle. Rolled his wrists nicely to keep this down
punched back to the bowler
right into the blockhole on middle, turned to deep midwicket
stands tall and punches this short of length delivery to long-on
neat little flick into the deep midwicket region, sensible stuff
dropped at third man by Rovman Powell! Short outside off, Rashid swayed inside the line and helped it over. Powell covered ground but couldn't hold on even as he was on the move

punched wide of backward point, now Powell has to run all the way around to his right, then slide, tumble and pull it back in. Target within touching distance now for Afghanistan. Down to single-digits
floats this full on off, squeezed back to the bowler. Holder roars back at the batsman in anger. Gulbadin sees the funny side of it.
touch full on off stump, defended.
full and sliding into the pads, flicked uppishly to deep square
sees this in his arc, looks for the glory hit but can only hit this straight to long-on. Powell makes no mistake this time.
length outside off, hint of away movement, left alone
banged in short outside off, he thought of the ramp but let this go. Wide signalled. Way over his head, good call.
beaten by a superb length ball that cuts back in from outside off
driven firmly to sweeper cover
right into the blockhole, honing in towards the base of leg stump, somehow kept out
swivels back and pulls to deep square leg, back for the second comfortably

those are the winning runs. Afghanistan live to fight another day. West Indies, unbeaten until today, have been brought to their knees. This should give Afghanistan so much confidence, such a big boost. That's one out of three. Nervy alright, but they still got the job done in the end. The man to thank with the bat: Rahmat Shah.
